TopicTitle: idk if i really needed to start a topic for this but I need some help

Articles.Content:
My game keeps on stopping halfway,and idk if it's because of the mods I have installed.
these are the mods i have installed:
BD Armory 1.3.1
Camera Tools
EVE
JSI
KRX
NAS
ParaSciEVE
Scatterer
SVT

Hello @Dylan the kermunnist.

I've moved your question to tech support, PC, modded. If you mean your game is stopping half way through loading, I would try cutting and pasting all your mods out of the gamedata folder and seeing if it loads. If it does, add the mods back one by one until you find the culprit.

ok i'll try that

I think it's BD Armory
